Address.value: 855 N WOLFE STREET,SUITE 601, BALTIMORE, 21205, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MIRA Pharmaceuticals, Inc. operates as a clinical development stage biopharmaceutical company. The company focuses on the development and commercialization of a new molecular synthetic tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) analog under investigation for the treatment of adult patients with anxiety and cognitive decline typically associated with early-stage dementia. It is developing MIRA1a, a synthetic cannabinoid analog to treat anxiety and chronic pain by targeting the cannabinoid type 1 and type 2 receptors. The company was formerly known as MIRA1a Therapeutics, Inc. MIRA Pharmaceuticals, Inc. was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Baltimore, Maryland.
